title: 4.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
If p = 6, and q = 8; evaluate the output in the following cases without and with the use of Console. Compare your results with the results obtained from the Console.
a) p * q + p
b) p * q / p
c) (p + q) - p * q

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
